lead_paragraph: SHANNON--George E.,83, Broadcast Pioneer dies. George Shannon was President of CBS in the 70s and 80s, during the golden years of the "Tiffany Network." He oversaw all broadcast production facilities nationwide, all remote production including sports events and major news coverages, network distribution system, engineering and development. Countless Emmy Awards for engineering excellence were earned under his leadership and vision. Mr. Shannon, of West Islip, Long Island, passed on January 4, 2016. He was the beloved husband of the late Rita J. Shannon. He was the devoted father of Sharon Ann Fuentes, Barbara Ann Kelly and Michael T. Shannon and the cherished grandfather of six. Mr. Shannon will be reposing at The Fredrick J. Chapey & Sons West Islip Funeral Home, 1225 Montauk Hwy., (Quarter mile west of the Robert Moses Cswy). Celebration of the Liturgy of Christian Burial, Saturday 10:00am at St. Joseph's R.C. Church, Babylon, Long Island. Interment to follow at St. Patrick's Cemetery, Huntington, Long Island. Visiting Friday, 2:00pm until 4:30pm and 7:00pm until 9:30pm. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, P.O. Box 5028, Hagerstown, MD 21741-5028 or to St. Johnland Nursing Center, 395 Sunken Meadow Road, Kings Park, NY 11754. 1/3
